name: Anushree Halder
title: UI/UX Designer
about: I am a passionate UI/UX designer with 1 year of experience in creating beautiful and user-friendly interfaces. I am skilled in all aspects of the design process, from user research and wireframing to prototyping and visual design. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow as a designer.
